Load data from given path recursively.

Source: R/load.R
load_path_json.Rd

Load data from given path recursively.

Usage

load_path_json(
  data_path,
  pattern = "\\.json(|\\.gz|\\.xz|\\.bz2)$",
  cache = NULL
)

Arguments

data_path

Data path to load from.

pattern

Regular expression pattern to match.

cache

File name to use as data cache.

Value

Tibble with loaded data.

See also

load_file_json()

Examples

load_path_json (rren_example (), pattern = '^results-small-version-[0-9]+\\.json$')
#> INFO [2025-02-12 11:58:07] Loaded 6 rows from file /home/runner/work/_temp/Library/rren/extdata//results-small-version-1.json.
#> INFO [2025-02-12 11:58:07] Loaded 6 rows from file /home/runner/work/_temp/Library/rren/extdata//results-small-version-2.json.
